projects.title: Rotary Pendulum RL
projects.description: Open Source project aimed at controlling a real life rotary pendulum using RL algorithms

projects.title: DQN Implementation from scratch
projects.description: Developed a Deep Q-Network algorithm to train a simple and double pendulum

projects.title: Multi Agents HAED
projects.description: University project which focuses on simulating a multi-agent system to perform environment mapping. Agents, equipped with sensors, explore and record their surroundings, considering uncertainties in their readings.

projects.title: Wireless ESC for Modular Drones
projects.description: Modular drone architecture proposal and proof of concept. The project received maximum grade.
